review: So far, so good. I like the subtitles on most shows, but didn't know how to get them on this stick ( I love them on Netflix which I already had), but my son showed me how to get them on this Fire stick;  they're called captions. I have only had this stick for a couple of days, but so far am very pleased with it. I also like the screensavers, but wish they had a descriptive name, as the photos are so beautiful, I'd like to know where or what part of the world they are from. I love being able to get an entire season of a TV show I've missed in the past. I also like  documentaries but haven't discovered where they are or how to access them.
author: Kay Scyphers

review: Love my stick!  Works great for just watching Netflix, amazon prime, and whatever app you are interested in. Has a lot of apps to choose from.  The only reason I gave four stars is the remote does not control volume or power on/off for the tv. It is plugged into the hdmi so should be able to contol the tv right?  Otherwise great product. Easy setup and so easy my 5 year old can use it.
